item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Nguyen Lam [MY CV] # I am a Software Developer Working Experiences # 1. Research Assistant at **Multimedia Mobile Networks Laboratory (MMNETLab)** 2. Backend Developer at **TMA Solutions** - Projects: Omnivista Cirrus, Omnivista 2500 NMS. 3. Android Internship at **BeesighSoft** Projects # 1. Multi-platoons Resource Allocation 2. Image Processing, Deep Learning 3. Evaluate Android Kernel Security by Analysing Source Code **[UIT Essay]** 4. Weather Preduction App **[UIT Course Proejct]** Skills # - Pogramming Languages: C/C++, Java, Python, Javascript, Matlab - Databases: SQL, No-SQL - OS: Window, Linux - Network: CCNA - Languages: .
